Text:
Hi, after downloading and installing pronuncations, which was around 450MB, keeps saying "This application failed the internet verification procedure.  PLease make sure that the Android Market account, which was used for purchase, is enabled on the device..   If the error persists, please, contact our Customer Support Service with the account data used for purchasin the app on Android Market."

It still works sometimes.  sometimes the message pops up, sometimes it works.

jelly bean 4.1
